function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exaggeration and panic related to COVID-19 due to social media","Impact":"Increased anxiety and corona phobia","Mitigation":"Promote accurate information and fact-checking on social media","Technologies":"AI-driven content moderation, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Users, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited use of social media for support during COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced access to support and recovery resources","Mitigation":"Promote and improve support networks on social media platforms","Technologies":"Online support groups, mental health chatbots","People":"Users experiencing COVID-19 anxiety","Owner":"Mental health organizations, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Positive impact on hygiene behavior from social media","Impact":"Improved personal and environmental hygiene practices","Mitigation":"Promote and share hygiene-related information and tips on social media","Technologies":"Interactive infographics, educational videos","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, social media influencers"}]}
